column2: Ready to try the second fob? Let's hope our luck holds!
Great. So, as before, let's go to the clubhouse.
Click on the button at the right to open the clubhouse.
Alright, here goes! Let's see if this old fob works!
Ah, excellent. Just as I'd hoped. Now we're 2/3 of the way there!

If I know Riley, she's trying to tell us something. I'm taking note of everything she's saying.

But for now we have one more fob to go! Faber is going to guide you through Fizzics for that one.
Check back later and we'll keep working on getting access to the box.
